# @react-element/bg-music

> react (微信) 背景音乐, 详细文档后续补全

## Install

```bash
npm install --save @react-element/bg-music
```

## Usage

```tsx
import * as React from 'react'

import BgMusic from '@react-element/bg-music'

class Example extends React.Component {
  render () {
    return (
      <BgMusic.Default/>
    )
  }
}
```
